articles.title: US vs. China AI race: Which companies are set to gain
articles.mainIdea: US vs. China AI race: Which companies are set to gain
articles.summary: Yahoo Finance Video: US vs. China AI race: Which companies are set to gain. The Trump administration announced it will allow Nvidia (NVDA) to sell H200 chips in China. KraneShares chief investment officer Brendan Ahern joins Market Domination to discuss the ongoing artificial intelligence (AI) race between the US and China. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination. Related tickers mentioned: BABA, BABAF, BAIDF, BIDU, TCEHY, TCTZF.
